alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 5:38AM MST until December 03 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches near Highway 40 from East of Maybell. Winds gusting 25 to 35 mph will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy to snow packed road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas south of Highway 40 near Meeker will see less snowfall generally and inch or less.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
